Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Revised: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: Revised: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North Avenue, Central, Grand, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Bloomingdale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, North Avenue, Central, Grand, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Bloomingdale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/delays due to track switching problems at Kimball. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays due to track switching problems at Kimball.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #81 Lawrence, #78 Montrose, #80 Irving Park, or #152 Addison.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Yates, 73rd, South Shore & 71st: due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Yates, 73rd, South Shore and 71st: due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
